choices: Zac waits on someone to come into the room
11.content:
"Wow. What happened?" Zac said aloud to himself as he looked around. "Holy shit!'

Everything was bigger than he was. When he looked over he could see his refelction in table side and saw he was barely an intch tall.

" I gotta find some help!"
11.title: Zac

choices: Zac hides and see what the person is doing there
111.content:
Zac glanced around, wondering where his cousin might be. "Why does this have to happen to me?"

He slipped out of the room, deciding to just check the entire house. "I hope no one sees me... This would be so hard to explain."

He stayed in shadows--not that hard to do when you're this small-- and moved from room to room, freaking out more as went. He had no idea how he was going to tell Mecheal what happened or even if she would believe him.

His trek led him in a full circle through his house, and, defeated, he walked back to where he started. "Maybe I should just wait for someone to show up," he grumbled.

Looking up, he noticed there was indeed someone there.
111.title: Zac goes to find Meachel

choices: Zac goes to find someone else
1112.content:
Hiding behind the sofa Zac waited to see who was coming in.

"Yeah, I'll be ther ein a minute. Just takin' a smoke break."

It was Philip. Thankfully he wasn't marching around and was just sitting down to have a ciggerate this gave Zac a chance to get his attention.
1112.title: Zac hides and see what the person is doing there

11122.content:
Zac ran closer, cupping his hands around his mouth to hopefully amplify his voice; "Philip!"

Philip dropped his cigarette, looking around slowly. Then he looked down at his fallen cigarette. "Still good," he mumbled as he went to grab it. He was about to raise it to his lips again when his eyes fell on Zac. Philip stared dazedly for a moment before looking at his cigarette. "Thought this was a nicotine one..." he said.

"Philip!" Zac yelled again, reaching the small step the giant sat on.

"Whatever-" Philip mumbled. "Sup little dude," he continued at a 'normal' volume. He set his cigarette on the step next to his thigh, snatching Zac up in one hand. "Oh a little Zac. Haven't seen you since last week. Did you get that job at the grocery store? Oh oh, is your cute cousin in town this weekend? Wha-? Oh sorry little guy, your voice is all quiet now. Go ahead man."
11122.title: Zac Shouts Philip's name

choices: A mix of characters come in.

112222.title: You Just Screamed Into His Ear...What Do You Th...

13532.content:
Libby Henderson was, in many ways, your typical fifteen year old. Her tiny blonde stature did nothing to help her stand out against her taller blonde schoolmates, who numbered in double figures and boasted double D's, as well as towering over her by about a foot.

So what is a teenager to do, being practically invisible in every day life?

Relish it.

With no one paying much attention to her, Libby could slip through crowds unnoticed, and she was practically immune from getting bullied, because that would mean they'd have to notice her first. Being unremarkable was, ironically, the best thing that ever happened to Libby, in her own opinion.

But that's enough exposition. Let's discuss how Libby here ended up randomly shrinking. First things first; where was she?
13532.title: Little Libby

13533.content: How about either Zac or Marys young boy cousins ???
13533.title: Readers choice

info.brief_description: One day you shrink in your friends houses. Try to get out alive.
info.description:
In this story you will pick a main character and try to live through the house and get someone to notice you.

The Main Characters Are:

Zac - Short, Emo hair. In the closet gay.

Seamus - Tall, lanky, long red hair. Gay and slutty.

Other characters :

Ian - Seamus's slutty sister. Small framed with small boobs. Lets say B cup. She loves to pick on her brother.

Mary - Seamus little sister. About 6 years old.

Meachel- Zac's older cousin. Tiny, no boobs at all, long black hair and pale.

Marcus - Zac and Seamus's friend. Blonde, English, can be a totally asshole but is sweet when he wants to be.

Philip - Tall and sorta muscular. Long shaggy black hair bit of a pot hair and a chain smoker. Sorta dumb but very nice and friendly.

Sophie Anne - Mark's ex-grilfriend. Can't stand Zac and goes out of her way to mess with him. Long dakr red hair and C cup.

Jade - Smart friend of Zac and Seamus. Kinda chubby with a C cup.

Libby - Thin with blonde hair and blue eyes. Very sweet yet oblivous. Hates when guys stare at her. A cup.


You can add any other characters you like. Also anything goes. Just have fun! But try not to have to much feet.

COME ON EVERYONE! COME ADD! I SEE THAT SOME PEOPLE ARE READING THIS SO PLEASE ADD TO IT! ANYTHING YOU LIKE!
